Name: For Sake's Sake
Ingredients: 45 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of float thin apple slice.
Review: Being dyslexic, I'm bewildered as to how to spell dyslexic while also amused by sake (the beverage brewed from rice) being spelt the same way as sake (as in for f**k's sake!). Hopefully, you'll find this aromatic, subtly orange-influenced sake and rum-based Martini-like cocktail both delightful to drink and easy to spell.
History: Created in April 2017 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
